index.description: A comma-separated list of indices to restrict the results

type.description: A comma-separated list of types to restrict the results

ignore_indices.description: When performed on multiple indices, allows to ignore `missing` ones

min_score.description: Include only documents with a specific `_score` value in the result

preference.description: Specify the node the operation should be performed on (default: random node)

source.description: The URL-encoded query definition (instead of using the request body)

body.description: A query to restrict the results (optional)
